communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Public Records Law, G.L., c. 66, § 10, I hereby request the following records:

all data, including statistical information, collected from any Massachusetts Uniform Citation (“MUC”) issued in the Commonwealth between January 1, 2021 and May 2024.

Some important fields may include: 

City of Boston Employee ID (6 digit ID)
Employee first name
Employee last name
Employee middle name
Badge Number
Rank
District/Taskforce
Date of Stop
Time of Stop
Location of stop
Race of driver
Gender of driver
Age of driver
If search occurred
If contraband was found,

I also request a waiver of all fees for this request, as disclosure of the requested information to me is in the public interest and will contribute to the public’s understanding of operations and activities of the government. This request is being made for research conducted by Spark! at Boston University and will not be used for commercial use.

I expect the request to be filled in an electronically-accessible format, including for screen readers, excel, or CSV. Files that are not accessible to screen readers include, for example, .pdf image files as well as physical documents. We understand that the data may be large in size, so feel free to send it over in year or half-year increments.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires. If you believe any of this information to be exempt, I ask you to please cite the specific portion of the law on which you rely. I also ask you to please redact any information you believe to be exempt and disclose the rest. If you need to discuss this request, I can be reached at 617-358-8514.

Sincerely,
Boston University SPARK!

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: FOIA Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Montgomery County Jail Facility to please provide e-mail copies of any and all internal correspondence, e-mail, memos and texts using key words “Vipin Shah”.  The date range for this request is January 1, 2016  through December 31, 2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marcia Louise Morris
